data.name: Third Power
data.detailed_description:
Third Power is a twist on the traditional puzzler, where players must balance alternating between two distinct forms and use the unique abilities of both in order to advance through a mysterious and dangerous cave system. You’ll have to dodge traps, defeat monsters, deflect projectiles, and decipher clues as you puzzle your way through the numerous stone chambers, each of which boasts unique challenges to overcome in order to progress.

Creative Puzzles
Each area presents new and exciting elements to discover. You’ll have to rely on the powers associated with each of your forms to figure out how to get through to the next room. From hidden panels to mysterious switches to manipulating projectiles to traversing mazes, there is no shortage of exciting brain teasers and satisfying solutions laid out before you.

Dangerous Foes
Ever wondered what being encased by jelly would feel like? What about fighting a wolf that can manipulate your very form? You’ll need to keep your wits about you and make the best use of your powers to defeat the menacing beasts that defend these enchanted halls.

Mysterious Lore
As you make your way through the perilous chambers ahead, you’ll uncover hints of a curse laid over the area, threatening anyone who dares move through the caves to satisfy their desire for fame or treasure. Will you be the first to achieve your goals without succumbing to the curse? Will you discover the mysterious third power? Uncover the secrets of the tomb before it’s too late or risk everything.

data.short_description: Third Power is a unique puzzle adventure where players alternate between forms with distinct abilities in order to progress through a mysterious tomb. Avoid traps, crush monsters, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of an enigmatic curse as you advance toward discovering your third power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz processor or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WDDM 1.0 or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
